title: ACOQOOS Juicer Machines, Cold Press Juicer Whole Fruit and Vegetable with 5.3" Wider and Larger Feeding Chute (Capacity 1.8L), Easy to Clean Juicers with 2 Cups, Masticating Juicer Black
features: 5.3" Feeding Chute: Discover the power of our 300W masticating juicer. With a large 5.3" feeding chute, it's easy to assemble, operate, and clean. You can easily add whole apples and veggies directly into the wider and larger feed chute. The automatic feeding design ensures a quick, fresh, and flavorful glass of juice every time
Easy to Clean: The juicer is simple to clean and assemble, ideal for anyone who avoids complex systems. It has a single auger and a filter without metal, reducing the number of parts to handle

BPA-free for Your Well-being: With our BPA-free juicer, you can confidently enjoy fresh juice. Savor the pure, natural flavors of your favorite fruits and vegetables without the concern of harmful chemicals

99% Superior Juice Extraction: Experience the exceptional juice yield of our 300W masticating juicer, efficiently extracting every drop of juice with a remarkable 99% yield. Enjoy smoother, pulp-free juice with unbeatable taste

Automatic Safety Feature: Our juicer machine is equipped with a smart sensor that automatically halts operation when the feed chute lid is opened. This ensures peace of mind for households with children and seniors, prioritizing safety at all times

Worry-free Guarantee: With ACOQOOS, enjoy robust one-year warranty, providing you with peace of mind. This dependable and thoughtful gift is perfect for weddings, birthdays, housewarmings, Thanksgiving, and Christmas, making it a fitting choice for any special occasion

Protection and Automatic Stop When Lid is Opened: The slow juicer will activate the overheat protection function after continuous use for 30 minutes. It can be used again after cooling down for 30 minutes. When you open the lid to add fruits and vegetables, the machine will stop working, ensuring safe use even for children. Make sure to close the lid tightly before turning on the machine.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page How to deal with it not working? Close Feeding Cover, and ensure the pin plate is FULLY INSERTED into the base to avoid poor contact. It is located underneath the handle. Contact After-sales Service Team, response within 24 hours. Should citrus fruits be peeled? Our juicer is capable of juicing citrus fruits with their peels on. However, the peels may alter the flavor of the juice. Remove the peels before juicing is better for the flavor of the juice and for optimal juice extraction. Can it juice whole fruits without chopping? Easy to make juice. Designed with an extremely large feeding chute. This allows you to put whole fruits directly into the machine without chopping. Regular-sized apples,oranges,and many other fruits can fit in easily,saving you both time and effort. How effective is its pulp separation process? The juicer at 300W ensures high juice 99% yield and extraction efficiency, extremely powerful! Works very well and the juice is soomth and good taste. It's truly a must-have kitchen gadget. Is the juicer easy to clean? It is easy to assemble and disassemble. Except for the motor, all other parts are dishwasher safe. Especially, flexible pulp outlet makes cleaning quick and easy and juicer strainer can also be rinsed directly with water.
